alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Blount; Knox; Loudon; Monroe; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 12:21PM CDT until June 25 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Loudon County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Knox County in east Tennessee... South central Anderson County in east Tennessee... Western Blount County in east Tennessee... Northern Monroe County in east Tennessee... Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 120 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Oak Ridge to near Kingston to near Rockwood, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Oak Ridge, Maryville, Lenoir City, Alcoa, Kingston, Sweetwater, Rockwood, Loudon and Madisonville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 345 and 376. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 61 and 84. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Blount; Knox; Loudon; Monroe; Roane
